question: you have just read an article in a national newspaper which claims that town centers in your country all look very similar to each other you don't fully agree with this opinion.write a letter to the editor of the newspaper. In your lettersay which points in the article you agree withexplain ways in which your town center is different from most other town centersOffered to give a guided tour of your town to the writer of the article
text: I am writing this letter with regards to the article you published in the national newspaper about town centres in your country looking very similar. Although I agree that with globalization and population increase most problems may be the same, such as traffic and pollution, each city has its own peculiarities.

The city where I have been living for over 25 years is a clear example of that. Here at Ribeirão Pires the train station has more than 100 years and it is really conserved, so it is possible to observe a vintage atmosphere in the beautiful architecture. In addition, downtown the main square was restored and painted with different colours, becoming a pleasant place to spend time with friends and family. Not only that, but also nature here is extremely well preserved, so you could see trees wherever you go, and they help to soften the heat.
All those factors are not seen in all town centres from my perspective. So that is why I would love to offer you a tour of my city with me as a guide.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Here at Ribeirão Pires. Consider adding a comma.
